entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: E 17 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
